author: cnbc.com
title: Senvest Capital Reports Results for the Year Ended December 31, 2017
text:
MONTREAL, March 29, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Senvest Capital Inc. (TSX:SEC) today reported net income attributable to owners of the parent of $166 million or $60.03 diluted earnings per share for the year ended December 31, 2017. This compares to net income attributable to owners of the parent of $96.8 million or $34.50 diluted earnings per share for the year ended 2016.
Financial statements are available online at Sedar www.sedar.com
CONSOLIDATED STATEMENTS OF
INCOME (in millions of dollars, except per share amounts) For the years ended December 31, 2017 December 31, 2016 NET INCOME ATTRIBUTABLE TO OWNERS OF THE PARENT $166 $96.8 DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $60.03 $34.50 Contact: George Malikotsis, Vice President Finance
